event.title: DSSSB Recruitment 2017 835 Superintendent, Matron Posts notification
event.description:
DSSSB Recruitment 2017 2018 Apply Online Application Form for 835 Legal Assistant, Asstt. Director, Pharmacist (Homeopathic), Grade-II (DASS) Posts. DSSSB Superintendent, Matron Jobs Notification 2017 Released. DSSSB welcomes on-line applications for arrangement in following Superintendent, Matron post in Delhi Subordinate Services Selection Board. Hopefuls are asked for to apply on-line through Official site www.delhi.gov.in. The last date for accommodation of Online applications is 21.11.2017. Planned applicants should apply before precisely perusing the ad in regards to the procedure of examinations and meeting, qualification criteria, Offline enrollment forms, installment of endorsed application expense/suggestion charges, DSSSB example of examination, DSSSB Syllabus, DSSSB Question Paper, DSSSB Admit Date Release Date, DSSSB Exam Date, DSSSB Result Date and so on and guarantee that they fulfil the stipulated criteria before Applying

DSSSB Recruitment 2017- 835 Superintendent, Matron Posts at www.delhi.gov.in:

Association Name: Delhi Subordinate Services Selection Board (DSSSB)
Work Category: Delhi Govt Jobs
Total No. of Vacancies: 835
Occupation Location: Delhi

DSSSB Invites Applications for the Following Posts

1. Review II (DASS) – 221 Posts
2. Drug specialist (Homeopathic) – 40 Posts
3. Lawful Assistant – 13 Posts
4. Asstt. Director – 96 Posts
5. Matron – 465 Posts

Qualification Criteria for DSSSB Vacancy 2017:

Instructive Qualification:

1. Grade-II (DASS) – Degree from a perceived college in Arts/Commerce/Science or Agriculture.
2. Pharmacist (Homeopathic) – 10+2 with Science Subject and Diploma in Homeopathy drug store of at least two years from a Government Board/foundation.
3. Legal Assistant – Bachelor degree in any subject with Bachelor’s in Law from a perceived college/organization.
4. Asstt. Superintendent – Bachelor degree from a perceived college.
5. Matron – 10+2 or senior Secondary go from a perceived Board.

Age Limit: (As on 21.11.2017)

Hopeful’s Age Limit Should not surpass 20 to 32 years for Grade-II, 27 years for Pharmacist, 30 years for Legal Assistant and 18 to 27 years for Asstt. Director and Matron. Applicants Relaxation in Upper Age utmost will be given according to Govt. Standards. Experience DSSSB official Notification 2017 for more reference

Pay Scale Details for DSSSB Superintendent, Matron:

Pay Scale:

1. Grade-II (DASS) – Rs 9300-34800/ – Grade Pay : Rs. 4600/ –
2. Pharmacist (Homeopathic) – Rs 5200-20200/ – Grade Pay : Rs. 2800/ –
3. Legal Assistant – Rs 9300-34800/ – Grade Pay : Rs. 4200/ –
4. Asstt. Superintendent – Rs 5200-20200/ – Grade Pay : Rs. 2800/ –
5. Lady – Rs 5200-20200/ – Grade Pay : Rs. 2800/ -

Choice Procedure for DSSSB Superintendent, Matron:

Applicants will be chosen in view of Tier I Exam, Tier II Exam

Exam Fee/Application Fee Details for DSSSB Superintendent, Matron:

Application Fee:

For General/OBC Candidates Application Fee is – Rs.100/ -

For Women applicants and competitors having a place with Schedule Caste, Schedule Tribe, Physically Handicapped and Ex-serviceman class are exempted from paying Application expense.

The most effective method to Apply for DSSSB Application Form:

Applicants fulfilling the above qualification conditions Use Following Procedure Given Below to Apply Online:

1. Sign on to DSSSB Careers Page at official site to www.delhi.gov.in
2. Qualified applicants are encouraged to open Notification
3. Read the Advertisement painstakingly to make certain about your qualification
4. Tap on the connection New Registration
4. Fill your Academic Qualification and Other Related Information according to the directions
5. Guarantee the data gave is right
6. Present the application and Make Payments
7. take a print from DSSSB Recruitment 2017 online application form

DSSSB Superintendent, Matron Posts Important Dates:

1. Beginning Date for Submission of Application: 01.11.2017
2. Last date for Submission of Application: 21.11.2017
3. Date of Examination: Dec 2017/Jan 2018
